TEXT.TITLE: AFFILIATED BANKSHARES <AFBK.O> NAMES CEO
TEXT.BODY: Affiliated Bankshares of Colorado Inc said president and chief operating officer Kent O. Olin has been named to the added post of chief executive, succeeding Leo Hill, who plans to retire at the end of the year. Reuter
